## DurableOperation.getContextDetails() method

Gets the details for a context operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getContextDetails(): ContextDetails<TResult> | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[ContextDetails](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.contextdetails.md)<!-- -->&lt;TResult&gt; \| undefined

The context operation details, or undefined if no operation data is available
